headline: Second HeLa Lawsuit Resolved As Novartis Reaches Confidential Settlement
summary: Novartis reached a confidential settlement with Henrietta Lacks' family, resolving a second lawsuit over the nonconsensual use of HeLa cells.

raw.headline: Second HeLa Lawsuit Resolved As Novartis Reaches Confidential Settlement
